info.name: Trustay API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Trustay rental platform with authentication flows and refresh token support

item.description: Complete authentication flow with refresh token support and automatic header management

item.name: üë§ User Management

request.description: Get authenticated user's profile (auto-auth enabled)
Update user profile information (auto-auth enabled)

item.description: User profile management endpoints with automatic authentication

request.description: Get list of all provinces in Vietnam
Get districts within a specific province
Get wards within a specific district
Create a new building (requires landlord role)
Get my buildings with pagination (requires authentication)
Get detailed information about a building
Update building information (owner only)
Get list of buildings owned by current user with pagination
Delete a building (cannot delete if there are active rentals)

item.name: üè† Rooms Management

request.description: Get my rooms with pagination (requires authentication)
Create room type with automatic room instance generation
Get detailed room type information with pricing, amenities, costs, rules
Get room details using slug (public endpoint for search)
Update room type - amenities/costs/rules arrays will COMPLETELY OVERRIDE existing data
Get list of room types in a building with pagination

exec: console.log('üö™ Room Instance ID saved:', response.data.instances[0].id);

query.description: Filter by status: available, occupied, maintenance, reserved, unavailable

request.description: Get room instances with status filter and statistics
Update status of a single room instance with business logic validation
Update status of multiple room instances at once (atomic operation)
Delete room type and all instances (cannot delete if there are active rentals)

item.description: Room type and instance management with complex CRUD operations

item.name: üîç Room Seeking Posts

exec: console.log('üìù Room seeking post created successfully!');
console.log('üí∞ Budget:', response.minBudget ? response.minBudget.toLocaleString() : 'N/A', '-', response.maxBudget.toLocaleString(), response.currency);

request.description: Create a new room seeking post (requires authentication). Slug will be auto-generated from title.

query.description: Sort field (createdAt, updatedAt, title, maxBudget, viewCount, contactCount)

request.description: Get my room seeking posts with pagination and search (requires authentication)

exec: console.log('üîç Room seeking post details retrieved successfully!');

request.description: Get detailed information about a room seeking post (public endpoint)
Update room seeking post (owner only). Slug will be auto-regenerated if title changes.
Update room seeking post status (active, paused, closed, expired)
Delete room seeking post (owner only)

item.description: Room seeking post management endpoints for tenants looking for accommodation. Slugs are auto-generated from titles. Search functionality is available via /api/listings/room-seeking-posts endpoint.
